name: Dis-Orientate
description:
HEADPHONES RECOMMENDED WHILE PLAYING Dis-Orientate is my submission for the GMTK Game Jam!

The theme was:

So I interpreted that as, only one colour.

The Premise

Dis-Orientate is a puzzle game, where levels only have, ONE COLOUR.

Instead of navigating puzzles with sight, levels are navigated with sound. Because of this, everything has a unique (and slightly spooky) sound.

This makes the game (At least I think) very claustrophobic and spooky.

The game is made with:

  • Gamemaker Studio 2 (Engine)
  • Paint.net (Art)
  • BeepBox (Sound and Music)
